Author: arabella_05
Text: are you me ?? because you've just described my life - except the boyfriend part because nobody loves me lol. i have no advice to offer except to remind you that we care about our own bodies way way way more than anyone else does. i have never been as critical about someone else's body, fat distribution, proportions etc. as much as i have been of mine when i look in the mirror. if your boyfriend put on a few lbs, would you no longer want to be with him ? i imagine the answer is no, because we fall in love with the person and not their body. be more easy on yourself. you are allowed to be vegan for both the environmental reasons and the weight loss 'benefit' - it's much better to acknowledge your decisions and habits rather than be in denial and low to yourself. but please be careful. i am the same as you, my whole day is filled with thoughts about my weight and my body and it's so toxic yet i can't stop it. i truly hope you are able to recover but remember to be patient with yourself. sending you lots of love my friend ðŸ’•
